steps.title: Step 1: Tell Us About Your Project
steps.description: Give us a quick rundown—what kind of junk you’re tossing, how much space you’ll need, and how long you’ll need the bin. We’ll help you choose the right size.

steps.title: Step 2: Schedule Your Dumpster Delivery
steps.description: Pick a day and time that works for you. We’ll confirm delivery and provide guidance on best placement and access.

steps.title: Step 3: Fill It Up at Your Pace
steps.description: We don’t rush you. Load the dumpster as your project progresses, and if you need more time or a second bin, we’re a call away.

steps.title: Step 4: We Pick It Up & Haul It Away
steps.description: Done? Let us know, and we’ll swing by to remove the dumpster quickly and leave your site clean and clear. Easy as that.
